text: Tasartha (hē muham'mada sa. !) Tapā'ī allāhakō mārgamā dharmayud'dha garnus. Tapā'ī upara āphū bāhēka aru kasaikō jim'mēvārī chaina ra mōminaharūlā'ī pani prōtsāhita garnē garnu. Sambhava cha ki nikaṭa bhaviṣyamai allāhalē kāphiraharūkō yud'dha rōkidē'ōs ra allāha sarvaśakti sampanna ra kaṭhōra sajāya dinēvālā cha
